text:
Quarq - Spearfish, South Dakota, United States

The job postings aren't up quite yet, but we're looking for engineers that can hack embedded C code and Python test scripting code in a Linux and open-source environment.

We make high-tech bicycle parts in a beautiful[1], out-of-the-way part of the country.

Official job postings will be up soon. In the meantime, email me: mrages at sram.com.

[1] https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=spearfish%20canyon
